section.title: Language Settings for Office
section.para: To change the language in which office works, select the following.

section.title: Language Settings
section.para: Control Panel -> Regional and Language Settings -> Languages Click on Details and then Key Settings

section.title: Map a network drive
section.para: You can map a network driver to a local driver which make it easier to access it.

section.title: Create a link toolbar
section.para: If you want to have quick access to your folders / network drivers you can create your own toolbar and put your links into it.
Right-click on the toolbar and select toolbar -> own toolbar.
Right-click on the toolbar and select toolbar -> own toolbar.
You can now pull the new toolbar on your desktop and then position it for example at the top of your screen. Fill the folder with links and you will have easy access to your folders.
